data.title: Meet Our Sales Team
data.meta_description: At Allen Edwin Homes we hand-picked the highest skilled sales professionals who can assist our valued home buyers in the home buying process. Come meet our sales team and get started on your dream home!
data.text:
Lance is a Regional Sales Director for Allen Edwin Homes. He manages the greater Kalamazoo, Battle Creek, Lansing and Southeast Michigan / Metro Detroit areas. He came to Allen Edwin Homes with extensive experience in the home building industry. He served as the Vice President of Sales and Marketing for the largest builder in the country as well as Vice President of Operations for a private builder prior to working for Allen Edwin. He also has been established as he co-authored a national sales training manual.

Why Lance decided to join Allen Edwin Homes: "The quality of a person's life is in direct proportion to their commitment to excellence. Allen Edwin homes demonstrates this commitment to both our internal and external customers."

Hometown: Northville, MI

Education: Michigan State University, Finance/Business

Hobbies and Interests: Reading, travel, exercise and family.

Mike is the Vice President of Sales and Marketing for Allen Edwin. He joined Allen Edwin Homes in February 2010. Prior experience includes new home sales with Pulte Homes of Michigan in 1999, becoming sales manager in 2003 and VP of Sales and Marketing for Pulte Homes of Ohio in 2004. From 2008 to 2010, Mike worked with KB Homes in South Carolina and North Carolina as VP of Sales and Marketing.

Reason for Joining the Allen Edwin Team: ‚ÄúThe people of Allen Edwin. The team is highly focused and devoted to building and delivering a great home and experience for our homeowners. I toured and visited several communities and the New Home Showroom and was amazed at the features and style that was offered for a new home including Energy Star, 10 Year Structural Warranty and great style features such as granite counter tops, crown and chair moldings, stainless steel appliances and more. All of this is designed to give homebuyers an unparalleled home buying experience.‚Äù

Education: BA Degree from Michigan State University

Hobbies/Sports/Recreation: Family, golf, travel and reading.

Licenses/Affiliations/Memberships: Michigan State University Alumni Association, Knights of Columbus.

Phone: (616) 238-2142

Email: mmcgivney@allenedwin.com

Start Date: January 2017

Story/path to AE: Over the past 10 years Lori has partnered with some of the best builders in the industry as a representative for Residential Warranty Company. Throughout her career, she has skillfully forged relationships and acquired a unique perspective working with both builders and home owners. Her role involved extensive travel between 5 states, so she is thankful to be able to remain closer to home and enjoy beautiful West Michigan and all that it has to offer.

‚ÄúHaving worked with Allen Edwin Homes for the past 9 years as an RWC builder member, and being very familiar with the excellent warranty program that they offer, I reached out directly to them when I was ready to make the transition. I am blessed beyond words that I am now part of their Sales Team! I proudly represent the amazing quality, space, style and value that Allen Edwin Homes offers. It is an honor to help families find the home and community that perfectly fits their needs.‚Äù

Hobbies/sports/recreation: I LOVE to travel! We have recently ‚Äúchecked off‚Äù Ireland and Hawaii, next on the list is Australia (and a return visit to Kaui). We also enjoy spending time with our children and grandchildren. During short trips in and around West Michigan, we like to camp, kayak and take in beautiful sunsets.

Licenses/Affiliations/Memberships: Builder Salesperson License. Advocate for Victim Services Unit in Holland. Board Member of Pancakes are Us, a non-profit organization that provides Saturday breakfasts at no charge to help fill the needs of those in our Holland community.

Phone: 616-265-6361

Email: llewis@allenedwin.com

Kelly earned her Bachelors of Business Administration & Marketing from Grand Valley State University. She is a Sales Counselor in the Grand Rapids Region and can be reached at (616) 350-7288.

Her career in new home sales started in 2015. ‚ÄúI knew I found my passion for serving others and introducing the idea of a new home to those who didn‚Äôt know it was possible!‚Äù New construction has always been a part of her life, so she understands the process very well. Kelly strives to remove the stress from homebuilding and make the process fun and easy for families. Before joining the AEH team she worked in corporate retail merchandising and marketing in Michigan and Ohio.

‚ÄúI joined Allen Edwin Homes because I noticed something different here. Allen Edwin Homes offers unparalleled value in terms of style, space, features, customer service and home warranty. The team at Allen Edwin Homes truly puts our clients first. It is an honor to serve our homeowners and help fulfill their dreams!‚Äù

In her spare time Kelly enjoys traveling, spending time with family and friends, exploring the outdoors, gardening, playing tennis, decorating, reading, and learning. She possesses her Real Estate Salesperson License and Builder Salesperson License.

(616) 350-7288

klehman@allenedwin.com

Background: Prior to Allen Edwin I worked in the construction field as a Roofer for over 10 years. I then started my sales career as an Auto Sales Consultant and eventually becoming a Sales Manager at Williams Auto in Traverse City where I spent 8 years.

What is your story/path to AE: I grew up in Lansing then eventually moved to Traverse City where I‚Äôve spent the last 20 + years. I recently moved to the Grand Rapids area to be closer to family. My family has always loved the Grand Rapids area and we‚Äôre very excited about our future here. I‚Äôve always had a dream to be in Home Sales and I‚Äôm very happy to have the opportunity to work with such a reputable builder whom offers an incredible experience for both our clients and our team.

Hobbies/sports/recreation: In my spare time I enjoy being with my family the most. We love movie nights, camping, hiking, and basically anything outdoors. I‚Äôll also take almost every opportunity to get myself out on a lake to do some Bass fishing.

Start Date with AE: October 2021

Licenses: Builder Salesperson License.

Phone number: 616-387-9762

Education: Forest Hills Central High School, GRCC, and Davenport University

Start Date with AE (Month & Year): 9/11/23

Background (work experience prior to AE):

- Worked in Real Estate for the past 18 years and for the last 15 of that I was working at the family Real Estate company Dunlap & Associate LLC. I ran the day to day operations as well as my Real Estate business.

What is your story/path to AE:

- I have always enjoyed working with Allen Edwin over the years in the capacity of Broker for my own Real Estate business because the sales process was so smooth. When I learned of the opportunity to join the Sales Team, I responded right away.

Hobbies/sports/recreation:

- I love to hunt, play basketball, fish with my boys, and spend time watching my kids sporting events.

Licenses/Affiliations/Memberships:

- I was a licensed Real Estate agent/Associate Broker for the past 18 years

Start Date with AE: October 2021

Licenses: Builder Salesperson License.

Phone number: 616-741-6732

Jim first worked for Allen Edwin Homes in 2004 and recently rejoined the company in October 2014.

Jim's Background: I started in the financial planning industry and realized that I did not have any passion or excitement for what I was doing. In 2004 I started in Sales at Allen Edwin Homes and jumped in with both feet. After a couple of years I decided to pursue other career goals and after 7 years realized that my true love and passion was working in the new home industry. I am very pleased to have returned to Allen Edwin Homes.

Jim attended Vicksburg High School and graduated from Western Michigan University with a BBA Sales and Business Marketing/Finance. He obtained an Executive MBA from The Ohio State University. Jim enjoys golfing, cars (mainly Corvettes but also muscle cars and Ferrari‚Äôs), snowmobiling, photography, and pretty much anything else that goes fast. He enjoys spending time with his wife Julie, daughter Madison, and 2 black labs Enzo and Lilly.

Phone: 269-330-5916

Email: jdouglass@allenedwin.com

Education: Bachelors in Social Science from Western Michigan University

I originally began my career at Allen Edwin Homes in May of 2007. I departed in May 2016 to pursue a career in the mortgage industry and returned in December of 2018. I have been with the Allen Edwin Homes for a total of 9 years. I have worked in mortgage lending, Customer Service and Business banking as well.

I started my journey with Allen Edwin Homes as a first-time buyer back in 2006 when my wife and I stumbled into a model home. We decided to build our first home and are now 2-time AEH Homeowners. I would never endorse a product I did not believe in 100 percent. I have personally experienced the value that Allen Edwin Homes provides to families. I love our homes and the people affiliated with the company, which lead me back to this amazing organization. Helping people understand our value and find the right fit is something I take great pride and pleasure in doing.

Fun Facts: I spend most of my spare time with my wife and our 4 kids. We are a hockey family, so you will find us in and around the hockey rinks of Kalamazoo often. I coach hockey for my two boys. We spend most of our time doing outdoor activities and love to travel.

Phone: 269-760-1310

Education: BA Graphic Design, Minor

Graphic Design from Western Michigan University

Start Date with AE (Month & Year): September 11, 2023

Background (work experience prior to AE): I worked for an ad agency for almost 10 years before I started my own company and worked for myself for 17 years. I have worked with start-up, non-profit and fortune 500 companies with marketing, graphic design, photography and videography support. I have served as the Paw Paw Area Chamber of Commerce President for multiple terms and enjoy supporting my community of Paw Paw and Southwest Michigan.

What is your story/path to AE: I have worked with Allen Edwin Homes for about 8 years as a photographer. Getting to know and work with the amazing team at Allen Edwin Homes has been a pleasure and seems like a natural fit when this opportunity presented itself. I look forward to supporting and helping introduce AEH to our Hispanic/Latino community.

Hobbies/sports/recreation: Photography, coaching basketball and softball, vintage cars and spending time with my family.

- Licenses/Affiliations/Memberships:

- West Michigan Hispanic Chamber of Commerce

- West Michigan Hispanic Foundation

- Paw Paw Area Chamber of Commerce

- DEI Certification

- Board Leadership Certified ‚Äì Kalamazoo Foundation

- National Association of Photoshop Professionals

- WPPI Certification

Contact number: 269-633-9466

Education: Alexis Waple graduated from Central Michigan University in 2018 with her Bachelors Degree in Business Administration with a Major in Marketing and Concentration in Professional Sales.

Start Date with AE: October 2021

Background: Following graduation she went on to do sales at DM Payroll for 3 years.

What is your story/path to AE: Alexis went on and earned her Real Estate License after completely renovating a 1900 farmhouse of her own and finding her true passion. ‚ÄúI‚Äôve always loved looking at houses for fun in my free time and envisioning how someone could make it a home. Once I was able to do that for myself, I wanted nothing more than to help others find that and achieve that themselves‚Äù Alexis also enjoys crafting, home decorating, traveling, spending time with family, friends and her two bulldogs. ‚ÄúI am so excited to be working with Allen Edwin Homes, I feel like I found my true calling in a career and landed my absolute dream job!‚Äù

Hobbies/sports/recreation: crafting, DIYS, travel

Licenses: Real Estate License

Phone number: (248) 495-4786

Education: Graduated Western Michigan University, studying sales and real estate.

Start Date with AE (Month & Year): Started as a full-time Sales Associate on 5/2/2022 and was a part-time intern since October.

Contact number: 269-249-8423

Background (work experience prior to AE): I worked as a Sales Development Representative at an Ann Arbor based technology company and was a part time driver for Two Men and a Truck while finishing school.

What is your story/path to AE: During college I worked at the moving company that Allen Edwin Homes partners with for Model staging. I was on the job moving furniture for AEH when I began making connections with members of their team. I expressed my interest in the company and that I was pursuing a degree in Sales & Real Estate at Western Michigan University. I was able to secure an interview for the Sales Counselor position and joined the Sales Team as an intern right after the fall of my senior year.

Hobbies/sports/recreation: I love to be active outside and be doing a little bit of everything. Swimming, sports, games, boating, kayaking, fishing, ice skating/hockey, biking, roller blading and reading.

Licenses/Affiliations/Memberships:

Chauffeur‚Äôs License

Bridgepointe Nonprofit

Education: Ferris State University, Bachelor of Business/Hospitality

Start Date: August 2016

Background: During my years at Ferris State University I realized that whatever career path that I took, I wanted to work in a field where I would provide a service to people and make each and every interaction with someone exceeding and exceptional. With other family members in the real estate industry I saw a great opportunity to do exactly what I have been searching for. I acquired my real estate license during my senior year in college and have been doing residential real estate up until this amazing opportunity with Allen Edwin Homes.

Story/path to AE: I am the oldest of eight siblings so family is a huge aspect of my life. My two greatest passions are family and customer service. I truly strive to make each family that I work with have an experience that will not only be one to remember but also exceed expectations at all angles. In my path to finding a company that lines up their values with mine and takes care of the customers with confidence behind their name. I am happy to say that I work for the best builder in the entire United States.

Hobbies/sports/recreation: Spending time with family, staying active, going to the movies

Licenses/Affiliations/Memberships: Real Estate License

Phone: (248) 943-2955

Email: rnouhan3@allenedwin.com

Start Date with AE (Month & Year): I began my career at Allen Edwin in September of 2023.

Background (work experience prior to AE): I‚Äôve spent many years in various sales roles that have helped lead me to Allen Edwin. Most recently as a Mortgage Loan Officer, which helped me realize my passion for helping families purchase their first home. It also laid the groundwork for helping families overcome any financial obstacles that may lie in their way of home ownership. I have always had a passion for Real Estate including fixing and flipping 2 homes in my spare time.

What is your story/path to AE: I will never forget searching for homes with my family as a child. It was such a great experience that lit a passion for me that has stayed with me ever since. The home we finally decided on was a new construction home in Livingston County and was part of the most amazing community. I feel so fortunate to grow up in such a great community with lots of friends and family nearby that I can‚Äôt wait to help others achieve their goal of home ownership as well.

Hobbies/sports/recreation: Family, Sports (especially Golf), Poker, Adventure Junkie (sky diving, roller coasters, etc.)

Licenses/Affiliations/Memberships: Mortgage License, Builder Sales License

Contact number 734-827-4520

Education: Ferris State University, Bachelor of Business/Hospitality

Start Date: August 2016

Background: During my years at Ferris State University I realized that whatever career path that I took, I wanted to work in a field where I would provide a service to people and make each and every interaction with someone exceeding and exceptional. With other family members in the real estate industry I saw a great opportunity to do exactly what I have been searching for. I acquired my real estate license during my senior year in college and have been doing residential real estate up until this amazing opportunity with Allen Edwin Homes.

Story/path to AE: I am the oldest of eight siblings so family is a huge aspect of my life. My two greatest passions are family and customer service. I truly strive to make each family that I work with have an experience that will not only be one to remember but also exceed expectations at all angles. In my path to finding a company that lines up their values with mine and takes care of the customers with confidence behind their name. I am happy to say that I work for the best builder in the entire United States.

Hobbies/sports/recreation: Spending time with family, staying active, going to the movies

Licenses/Affiliations/Memberships: Real Estate License

Phone: (248) 943-2955

Email: rnouhan3@allenedwin.com

Education: Indiana University South Bend

Start Date with AE (Month & Year): September 2023

What is your story/path to AE:

I was the appliances subcontractor for many builders in the Michiana area through Best Buy. That experience taught me that the best builders were the ones that had great systems. It was a natural fit for me when I learned that Allen Edwin Homes had a New Home Sales position open in my area. I‚Äôm proud to work for the largest new home builder in Michiana.

Hobbies/sports/recreation: My wife and I enjoy cooking international foods and watching movies at the theater. We enjoy planning our next international trip together. Our family, church, and favorite non-profits are located right here in Michiana. We love giving back to the community that have given so much to us.

Contact number: 574-395-4468

Jim first worked for Allen Edwin Homes in 2004 and recently rejoined the company in October 2014.

Jim's Background: I started in the financial planning industry and realized that I did not have any passion or excitement for what I was doing. In 2004 I started in Sales at Allen Edwin Homes and jumped in with both feet. After a couple of years I decided to pursue other career goals and after 7 years realized that my true love and passion was working in the new home industry. I am very pleased to have returned to Allen Edwin Homes.

Jim attended Vicksburg High School and graduated from Western Michigan University with a BBA Sales and Business Marketing/Finance. He obtained an Executive MBA from The Ohio State University. Jim enjoys golfing, cars (mainly Corvettes but also muscle cars and Ferrari‚Äôs), snowmobiling, photography, and pretty much anything else that goes fast. He enjoys spending time with his wife Julie, daughter Madison, and 2 black labs Enzo and Lilly.

Email: jdouglass@allenedwin.com

Graphic Design from Western Michigan University

Background (work experience prior to AE): I worked for an ad agency for almost 10 years before I started my own company and worked for myself for 17 years. I have worked with start-up, non-profit and fortune 500 companies with marketing, graphic design, photography and videography support. I have served as the Paw Paw Area Chamber of Commerce President for multiple terms and enjoy supporting my community of Paw Paw and Southwest Michigan.

What is your story/path to AE: I have worked with Allen Edwin Homes for about 8 years as a photographer. Getting to know and work with the amazing team at Allen Edwin Homes has been a pleasure and seems like a natural fit when this opportunity presented itself. Contact number: 269-633-9466

Education:

Graduated/Studied marine technology at National University Polytechnic Institute

Studied Zoology with a focus in Marine Biology at MSU

NASM Certified Personal Trainer

NBHMDT certified hyperbaric technologist

National Registered Emergency Technician

Start Date with AE (Month & Year):

August 2023

Email:

jbecker@allenedwin.com

Background (work experience prior to AE):

Barista and Hostess through college

Hyperbaric Technologist in Denver, CO and San Diego, CA; (2018-2020)

Remote Disclosure analyst for Guaranteed Rate (2020-2022)

Hyperbaric Technologist in Phoenix, AZ (2022-2023)

What is your story/path to AE:

Attended MSU. Moved to the mountains in Colorado and worked for vail resorts. On a whim, I moved to San Diego to pursue commercial dive school as the only female in my program of 18. Completed the trade school certified in Dive Medicine Technology. After some time between school, I returned to Colorado, Denver this time as a certified hyperbaric technologist and EMT. One year in Denver, I returned back to San Diego still in hyperbarics, working at an outpatient facility and emergency dives at UCSD. After covid, I took a break from healthcare and worked remote in mortgage. This allowed me the opportunity to travel, leavingCA, returned to MI to see family for some time and decided to live in Memphis Tenesseee and New Orleans for a few months before returning home. Continuing to take advantage of the freedom remote work offered, I moved to Phoenix Arizona. After an unexpected lay off in Feb 2022, I decided to pursue becoming a personal trainer. After working at multiple gyms, I was offered an opportunity to work Hyperbarics again at a private wellness center.

Life took a few unexpected turns, and making the decision to want to be closer to family and back in Michigan after 8 years, I returned to Michigan, moved to Gran Haven and the rest is history üòä

Hobbies/sports/recreation:

-running

-kayaking

-weight lifting

-cooking

Licenses/Affiliations/Memberships:

NASM Certified Personal Trainer

NBHMDT certified hyperbaric technologist

National Registered Emergency Technician (NREMT)

aura has previous experience as a sales manager for three furniture stores and a home accessory store that were located in Lafayette, IN. She joined the Kalamazoo Sales Team in 2011 and after helping customers build homes in the area for 5 years changed roles with the company to the Online Sales Advisor Team.

"I am thrilled to be on board with Michigan's #1 builder, Allen Edwin. This company is operating on a fantastic business model to achieve such high customer service ratings. Quality built homes with more square footage, more choices, and a better experience...this is what people are looking for in home ownership! I can't think of a more fun and rewarding career than helping others find their dream homes!"

Hometown: Coldwater, MI

Education: Bachelor of Science in Psychology, Michigan State University

Hobbies/Sports/Recreation: My favorite time is best spent with my two daughters and two dogs Pete and Buddy. I love to travel, go for hikes, work in the garden, and spend time on Lake Mi in the summer.
